data.text: @CapitalCCider Wow! The Korean “conflict” was a brutal, meat grinder of battles based on what I’ve seen & read over the years, props to ur pops 👍🏼
@macfox13 Scott.  My dad was a Navy Doc  surgeon deployed to Korea conflict for 20 months.  Assigned to a Marine Battalion….. he gained mad surgical skills.  He could filet fish like a sushi master

@thatbeigepanth1 @macfox13 @fox13 Not everything is a conspiracy, but how the Media and government joined to prevent discussion of Covid certainly is.  Down south, they closed the DRMC and set up plastic tents for the legion of Covid victims who never appeared.  It's either conspiracy or stupidity. Pick one.

@AmeriZens @macfox13 @fox13 Read. The. Article. I worked at the U Hospital during the height of the pandemic. There is a difference between a normal hospital bed and a bed (and the staff on the floor) designed for post operative patients. Come on, man. Everything can’t be a conspiracy.
@AmeriZens @macfox13 @fox13 No. That's not what he's saying numnuts.

@macfox13 @fox13 Wait- you're telling us that UofU had CLOSED HOSPITAL BEDS during Covid?!?  (I knew this of course, but it's weird to see the Media finally admit it.) You people are reprehensible.  You lied non-stop about Covid from Day One, and then tried to censor and destroy the truth.
@macfox13 @AidanCMcDonald someday, maybe this is how you come back home to Utah xoxox
